description:
Ami`s friend Kotomi has a crush on a boy. Unfortunately for everyone involved, that boy is Junta. With yet another heart added to the mix of bubbling romances, Karin becomes desperate to get Junta together with Ami, the only girl immune to the Mega-Playboy`s charms, and the only one that might tame the lady-killer-to-be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je ne peux parler à personne. Kotomi.
誰にも言えない! ことみ
